Title: The Puppet Masters
Writer: Robert A. Heinlein (novel), Ted Elliott (screenplay), Terry Rossio (screenplay), David S. Goyer (screenplay)
Actors: Donald Sutherland, Eric Thal, Julie Warner, Keith David
Plot: Strange aliens land in the Midwest, taking over people's minds in order to spread their dominion. Sam Nivens and Andrew Nivens, aided by Mary Sefton, are part of a government agency who must stop the the aliens before the aliens get to them...
